interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.TargetHumidity
interface.description: This interface provides a capability to set a target value of relative humidity.

property.name: TargetValue
property.description: Target set-point value of relative humidity

property.name: MinValue
property.description: Minimum value allowed for the TargetValue

property.name: MaxValue
property.description: Maximum value allowed for the TargetValue

property.name: StepValue
property.description: Step value allowed for the TargetValue setting

property.name: SelectableHumidityLevels
property.description: List of the selectable levels of target humidity. The list is only available when this interface is implemented for setting a qualtitative level of target humidity. (When MinValue = MaxValue)
